Question.Subject: purchased a product from americanmuscle.com?
Question.Content: what can i do if i had purchased a product from the sight and the product does not work at all,if i call could they refund me or will they say no its your loss)but not in that way) cuz i really dont want to be out 45 bucks if their product sucked,did anyone else buy something from teh sight and didnt like it and called in(what did they say)?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Here is a link to their return policy. I would suggest you call them quickly as there are time limits in which you can make the return.
http://www.americanmuscle.com/info.html#returns
Go ahead and call them and give them a chance to make it right to you. Most online companies want the opportunity to help rather than make you feel like you lost $45.
